Title: Travel Ground Bad Forest
Items: deep ravines criss-cross in your way, making for tiresome and time-consuming obstacles
exposed roots hiding under fallen leaves make walking treacherous
the densely-packed trees here make movement difficult
thick underbrush has destroyed all traces of any other typical routes
the stinging nettles this area is rife with complicate all movement
the water-saturated soil belabors every step as feet sink into it
the thick blanket of fallen leaves is tiresome to trudge through
as if that wasn?t bad enough, a swift river you weren?t expecting runs across your direction of travel
giant stands of thornbushes are constantly in the way
the area is absolutely choked with brambles
there are several wide riverbeds in the way with trickling water and steep, cliff-like sides
large fallen trees periodically block your path
the mushy ground strewn with fallen trees adds to the difficulty
the thick underbrush makes it twice as frustrating
what seemed like solid, cracked mud on the ground at first turned out to be only a dried layer atop actual, terribly thick mud
impossibly deep mud exhausts every effort to traverse it- as every step sinks into it nearly a foot deep
making matters worse, the ground is absolutely infested with thorn-riddled picker bushes here
the extremely thick canopy here blots out nearly all the light from above
this area is rife with giant tree roots crisscrossing the landscape, some as thick as a halfling is tall
the whole area is comprised of a thick stand of water-logged trees, that no doubt harbors dangerous quicksand pools lying in wait for the unlucky traveller
